article_title: Healthcare investor Bryan Cressey: Obamacare irrelevant to our business

twitter.description: Bryan Cressey is one of private equity’s most experienced healthcare investors, having helped co-found GTCR back in 1980 (he was the “C”). He currently serves as founding partner ...
